snippet.title: Be My Horde - Official Release Date Reveal Trailer | OTK Games Expo 2024
snippet.description:
Be My Horde is an action fantasy roguelike developed by Polished Games. Kill enemies only to resurrect them so that they may become an undead army to claim and conquer the fantasy world. Be My Horde is launching into Steam Early Access for PC on June 18.

#Gaming #Games #GameTrailers
